description:
Return to rule with the Civilization VI: Leader Pass.* Lead your people to greatness with 12 leaders brand new to Civilization VI and 6 new takes on classic Civilization leaders.

* Base game required to access all Civilization VI Leader Pass content and additional DLC packs required to access certain leaders. Leader Pass is available for purchase and is already included as part of the Civilization VI Anthology Edition.
name: Sid Meier’s Civilization® VI Leader Pass
